mapper.select: select IFNULL(max(template_detail_index),0)+1 from dj_simulation_template_config_detail t where t.simulation_template_id=#{templateId}
SELECT id, simulation_template_id simulationTemplateId, CODE, NAME, image, label_name labelName FROM dj_simulation_template_config_detail where config_status = 0 and id=#{simulationDetailId}
mapper.update: update dj_simulation_template_config_detail set config_status = 1 where config_status=0 and city_id=#{cityId} and service_type_id = #{serviceTypeId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO dj_simulation_template_config_detail ( id, simulation_template_id, CODE, NAME, image, label_name, template_detail_index, config_status, create_date, modify_date, create_by, update_by, city_id, service_type_id ) SELECT CONCAT( DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y%m%d%k%i%s'), "", CEILING(RAND() * 900000 + 100000) ), simulation_template_id, CODE, NAME, image, label_name, template_detail_index, 0, create_date, modify_date, create_by, update_by, city_id, service_type_id FROM dj_simulation_template_config_detail WHERE config_status = 1 and city_id=#{cityId} and service_type_id = #{serviceTypeId}
mapper.select: SELECT id titleDetailId, CODE, NAME, image, CONCAT(#{addressUrl},image) imageUrl, label_name labelName FROM dj_simulation_template_config_detail where config_status = 1 and data_status = 0 and city_id=#{cityId} and simulation_template_id=#{simulationTemplateId} order by template_detail_index
